page.title: 03SPORTS DAY
page.content:
(6){Relay race}.(7){Marathon}.Is a long running race.(8){Bicycle race. (9){Wheel barrow.}It is a partner race one person places his hands on the ground his partner holds him by the legs and pushes him to the finish line. After each event points are awarded from first to sixth place. {RESULTS When all events are completed the points are added up and each person gets a total score.The best boy and girl get a cup which were presented by Mr.Roy McKibben.The house with the most points gets the Eames' Cup. {
